tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Can not believe the koala was﻿ taken back to the same bank it was desperately trying to escape from. Why are people so ignorant? They don't just swim up to say 'hi.'
Eddisplay , QUE﻿ HACES AQUI?
Because we CAN'T﻿ see the beauty if you don't hold the camera steady? :P
Yee Haw! Empathy will always be your best friend...Thanks﻿
Why is it such a challenge for most people to remain positive and﻿ see the beauty?
対岸へ行きたいのでは？﻿
LOL﻿
You should have given him a peddle﻿ as well..
Why don't you do it anyway. What a﻿ stupid comment.
So what﻿ happened to it?
>>>>>>>__̴ı̴̴̡̡̡ ̡͌l̡̡̡ ̡͌l̡*̡̡ ̴̡ı̴̴̡ ̡̡͡|̲̲̲͡͡͡﻿ ̲▫̲͡ ̲̲̲͡͡π̲̲͡͡ ̲̲͡▫̲̲͡͡ ̲|̡̡̡ ̡ ̴̡ı̴̡̡ ̡͌l̡̡̡̡.___ A new social network based on music and entertainment. Bropod.com
@davakins they have got﻿ a different sort of chlamydia.
Have you ever seen the comments on﻿ your channel?
you dont want those﻿ claws wrapped around your leg.
A miracle she﻿ didn't drop the camera into the river.
Zoom out ! Zoom out !﻿
careful,﻿ koalas will give you chlamydia.
Those Koala Bears are tame? That is amazing. I﻿ think they are friendly because they are not hunted, they are protected by wildlife protection laws.
What an﻿ amazing experience!!
SHUT UP AND KILL YOURSELF YOU STUPID﻿ FUCKBITCH!

My life suddenly seems so boring ><
Hey, I wrote a song, to belong, it could be right, it could be wrong...
I'd be grateful for some feedback.
(ps - If you like my song, it would mean a lot to me if you'd return here to thumb﻿ this comment up. Thank you!)
^_^
what an amazing expierience, well done to you the boat crew for remaining calm and having the koala'a best interests﻿ at heart. How awesome to be able to have this on film.

Reviewer.Books: Congo, The Eagle of the Ninth, The Green Mile
Reviewer.Movies: Two and a half man, Bourne Trilogy, Da Vinci Code, The Matrix, Angels en Demons, Hangover, Hangover Part II, Congo, I, Robot, The Eagle, Transformers I,II & III
Reviewer.Music: Chris Brown, Usher, Backstreet Boys, One Direction
